string.name: about_summary
string.i: A simple, yet powerful application to manage your apps.

resources.string: %s is added to the batch list
Are you sure to disable (if enabled) or enable (if disabled) the following app(s)?
Are you sure to export the following app(s) to device storage?
Are you sure to remove the following app(s)?
Are you sure to reset the following app(s)?
The following applications are added to the batch list
Your batch settings will be removed! Are you sure?
Failed to connect with Google Play Billing client!
Are you sure to install the split apk\'s from \'%s\'?
Are you sure to install app bundle \'%s\'?
Please Note: In order to install multiple APK\'s (split APK\'s), please place all of them in a single folder and select one among them. Package Manager will pick and handle the rest.
A list of people who contributed to this project
Check out detailed documentation to use Package Manager
The selected APK is exported into \'%s\'!
The entire app bundle is exported into %s!

In order to get this feature working on newer Android versions (Android R or newer), it is necessary to grant \"All files access\" permission to Package Manager. Kindly grant the permission manually from the new screen opened after clicking the \"Grant\" button.
Please Note: This feature is too experimental!
Are you sure to cancel the installation?
Unable to install the app because it conflicts with an already installed app with same package name
Application is incompatible with this device
Not enough storage space to install the app
Checkout more applications provided by the developer in Google Play
%s is not designed to run in user space!
Unable to open %s! Do you want to export it into device storage?
Allows a system app to access notifications
Required by an Accessibility Service, to ensure that only the system can bind to it
Receive a broadcast indicating that the system has finished booting
Access data from sensors that the user uses to measure what is happening inside his/her body, such as heart rate
Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call
Required to be able to access the camera device
Allows applications to change Wi-Fi connectivity state
Allows an app to access approximate location
Allows an application to request deleting packages
Allows an application to access precise location
Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service
Allows an application to access the GPS
Allows an application to install packages
Allows an application to access mute the microphone
Allows an application to received Signal Strength and Cell ID location
Allows an application to post notifications
Allows an application to see the number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect the call to a different number or abort the call altogether
Allows an application to read the user\'s calendar data
Allows an application to read the user\'s call log
Read contents of the clipboard service
Allows an application to read the user\'s contacts data
Allows an application to read from external storage
Allows read access to the device\'s phone number(s). This is a subset of the capabilities granted by READ_PHONE_STATE but is exposed to instant applications

Allows read only access to phone state, including the phone number of the device, current cellular network information, the status of any ongoing calls, and a list of any phone accounts registered on the device
Allows an application to read SMS messages
Allows an application to monitor incoming MMS messages
Allows an application to receive SMS messages
Allows an application to receive Emergency SMS messages
Allows an application to receive WAP push messages
Allows an application to record audio
Allows an application to run in the background
Start foreground services. Requires FOREGROUND_SERVICE permission
Create windows and show them on top of all other apps
Allows an application to be the only one holding audio focus
Show short duration messages on screen
Allows an application to collect component usage statistics
Allows an app to use fingerprint hardware
Use PowerManager WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming

Changing some operations will be dangerous! Please do it only if you know what you\'re doing. Also, please be aware that some operations are simply unchangeable (close and check back this page to know the new status).
Allows an application to access scan WiFi networks
Allows an application to write the user\'s calendar data
Allows an application to write (but not read) the user\'s call log data
Allows an application to write the user\'s contacts data
Read or write the system settings (there are limitations)
Allows an application to send SMS messages
Allows an application to write to external storage
Allows an application to set the wallpaper
Selected package is just removed! Aborting…
Rate or/and Review Package Manager in Google Play
Select and add all applications from this page to the batch list?
Invite your friends to use Package Manager
Package Manager %s can be obtained from\nGoogle Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartpack.packagemanager
Package Manager is an open-source application which is ready to accept contributions from the development community. Click here to check out the source code!

If you like to appreciate the efforts of the developer to provide this tool entirely free, please consider sending a small donation by clicking one among the below-provided options! Buying any of this product will award you a supporter badge here!
You\'ve already supported the development with this item before!
Thank you very much for your support \u2665\nIt will motivate me a lot to continue my projects more active! Moreover, you\'ll receive a supporter badge on the top of this page.
Thank you very much for your support!
Help me to translate this app! Click here to visit POEditor localization project

You\'ve selected \'%s\', which is a system application. Unfortunately, the Android ecosystem doesn\'t allow third-party user applications, such as Package Manager, to remove system applications in a non-rooted environment. Don\'t worry though! Package Manager will guide you to remove this application using the Android Debug Bridge (ADB) method. If you already have a fully working ADB, executing the following command from an ADB shell will uninstall this application. In order to configure a working ADB environment, please check out the linked Documentation page.
Sorry! You can\'t do this from here!
Uninstalling %s is failed or cancelled by the user!

Please note: Removing system apps will be sometimes dangerous!

 *** USE AT YOUR OWN RISK ***
Welcome to Package Manager, a simple, yet powerful application to manage your apps.
WARNING: This application is too powerful to mess up your device. The developer of this application won\'t take any responsibility if something wrong happened to your device.
Please Note: Root Access is either unavailable in your device, or declined for Package Manager! The capabilities of this application on your device will be, therefore, limited.
Please select a file with %s extension.
